text:
Author Jeff Sharlet: "When you go to the rallies and you talk to people ... [President Trump] really is God's chosen one. That means the rally itself has this sort of spiritual protection, the coronavirus ... it’s not going to touch you at the rally."

https://t.co/YoGcLWWqds
